CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "AUSTRAC Registered") , 0 , CASE(TEXT(S75_Status__c), "New", TODAY() - Type_Of_Registration_New_Date__c, "Issued", TODAY() - S75_Issued_Date__c, "Returned", TODAY() - S75_Returned_Date__c, "Submitted to WU", TODAY() - S75_Submitted_To_WU_Date__c, "AUSTRAC Issued", TODAY() - AUSTRAC_Issued_Date__c, "Missing Information", TODAY() - S75_Missing_Information_Date__c, "Submitted To AUSTRAC", TODAY() - Submitted_To_AUSTRAC_Date__c, null) )
CustomField.label: Number Of Days In Current S75 Status
